body.directions: Listen to the audio; then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Which of the following best matches the item indicated by the word in the audio?
body.correct: Job wonderfully done! 桌子 zhuōzi means “table.” It can be best matched with a 椅子 yǐzi (chair).
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the word in the audio again to understand what item it is, and then review the choices to see which one you would like to see next to the item to make the most sense. Don’t be confused by the many 子’s in the word and the choices.

body.quiz: Which of the following items will most likely be needed during the activity indicated by the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 炉子 lúzi (stove)
options: Audio for 书架 shūjià (bookshelf)
Audio for 床单 chuángdān (bed sheet)
Audio for 地毯 dìtǎn (rug/carpet)
body.correct: Terrific work! 做饭 zuòfàn means “to cook.” You will need a 炉子 lúzi (stove) to get the cooking going. You may not need a 床单 chuángdān (bedsheet) to cook a meal.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen again several times to identify which chore it is, and then consider what you might need for that particular activity.

body.quiz: Which of the following has the same final as the second character in the word in the audio?
body.correct: You got it! The second character in 冰箱 bīngxiāng (fridge) has the final “iang,” which is also in the second character in the word 善良 shànliáng (nice/kind).
body.incorrect: Oops. Listen to the audio several more times to identify the final of its second character. Then, sound out the words in the choices to see which one shares the same final.

body.quiz: Which of the following is an object for the activity indicated by the word in audio?
body.answer: Image of some dishes©iStock
options: Image of an array of desserts©iStock
Image of a stack of linen©iStock
Image of a pile of stationery©iStock
body.correct: Totally awesome! 洗碗 xǐwǎn means “to wash dishes.” Its object should be the dishes. You may not want to wash the desserts away!
body.incorrect: Oops. Listen to the audio several more times to identify the activity it represents; then check the choices to see which one makes the most sense for this activity.

body.quiz: In which of the following parts of a house will you most likely find the item indicated by the word in the audio?
body.correct: Very nicely done! 水槽 shuǐcáo means “sink.” It can easily be found in the kitchen, but maybe not as likely on the front porch.
body.incorrect: Oops. Listen to the audio several more times to identify the item indicated by the audio; then check the choices to see which part of a house this item can most reasonably be located in.
